name: First Class Room
description: The Sample Room is a one-room suite with queen-size bed and comfortable seating area. It is located downstairs with an outside entrance and is wheelchair assessable.

name: Deluxe Room
description: Duluxe Room is a 2-bedroom suite that offers a master bedroom with a queen-size bed. The smaller bedroom offers a full-size bed.
